name: OKR Drafting
description: Draft OKRs for a team or initiative
prompt_text: Draft a set of {num_objectives} OKRs for {team_or_initiative} covering the {time_period} period. These OKRs must ladder up to the following strategic context: {strategic_context}. Each objective should be ambitious yet achievable, and each key result should follow the {measurement_preference} measurement approach with clear thresholds for what constitutes on-track, at-risk, and off-track progress. For each OKR, explain the rationale for why it was chosen over alternatives, identify the leading indicators the team should monitor weekly, and note any cross-team dependencies that could block achievement. Ensure the full set of OKRs tells a coherent story about what the team will accomplish and why it matters.

variables.name: team_or_initiative
variables.label: Team or Initiative
variables.placeholder: e.g., Platform Team, AI-Powered Search Initiative

variables.name: strategic_context
variables.label: Strategic Context
variables.placeholder: Company/org-level goals this should align to
